mapper.select: select c.reviewCommentId, c.reviewNoteId, c.userId, c.reviewComment, c.reviewCommentLike, c.reviewCommentCreatedDate, u.userNickname from reviewComment c, user u where c.reviewNoteId = #{reviewNoteId} and c.userId = u.userId and c.reviewPageViewState = 'POST' order by c.reviewCommentCreatedDate desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewComment (reviewNoteId, userId, reviewComment) VALUES (#{reviewNoteId}, #{userId}, #{reviewComment})
